Kasturi & Sons Ltd [KSL or \'We\'] is the sole and absolute owner of & maintains http://www.thehindubusinessline.com, http://m.thehindubusinessline.com and other mobile applications (Apps) (hereinafter "website") to enhance public access to the The Hindu Business Line newspaper owned by KSL. This service is provided on an "As Is" basis & is continually under development.

KSL requires that all users/visitors to this site(s) on the World Wide Web (the "Site") adhere to these Terms & Conditions [T&C] & Rules & Regulations [R&R].

By accessing this Site you/user/visitor automatically confirm your acknowledgment & acceptance of these T&C & R&R which is the agreement between the parties.

Copyright/Trademarks [Collectively "Intellectual Property Rights"]\n

The trademarks, logos & service marks ("Marks") displayed on the Site are the property of KSL & other parties. Users are prohibited from using any Marks for any purpose including, but not limited to use as metatags on other pages or sites on the World Wide Web without the written permission of KSL or such third party which may own the Marks. All information & content including any software programs available on or through the Site ("Content") is protected by copyright. Users are prohibited from modifying, copying, distributing, transmitting, displaying, publishing, selling, licensing, creating derivative works or using any Content available on or through the Site for commercial or public purposes.

KSl grants you a limited licence to access and make personal use of this site but not for commercial purposes. We permit the use of materials on this website subject to due credit is given to KSL. The use shall also be subject to non-commercial use and limited to personal or academic dissemination. (including on social media and use on all kinds of media). Copyright should be acknowledged. Such use should not infringe on the Intellectual Property Rights of any person. When using material on this website, proper attribution to authors and/or copyright holders must be given. User is granted a limited, revocable and non exclusive right to create hyperlinks to the home page or any other page of KSL/The Hindu Business Line so long as any of these links do not portray KSL, The Hindu Business Line or their podcast or products or services in a false, misleading, derogatory or offensive manner. You may not use KSL\'s logos or proprietary graphics or trademarks as part of the link without express permission.

No Warranties

ALL CONTENT ON THE SITE IS PROVIDED TO YOU "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY & FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, SECURITY OR ACCURACY. KSL DOES NOT ENDORSE & IS NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR THE ACCURACY OR RELIABILITY OF ANY OPINION, ADVICE OR STATEMENT MADE THROUGH THE SITE BY ANY PARTY OTHER THAN KSL. OTHER THAN AS REQUIRED UNDER APPLICABLE LAW,

UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCE WILL KSL BE LIABLE FOR ANY LOSS OR DAMAGE CAUSED BY A USER\'S RELIANCE ON INFORMATION OBTAINED THROUGH THE SITE. IT IS THE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE USER TO EVALUATE THE ACCURACY, COMPLETENESS OR USEFULNESS OF ANY OPINION, ADVICE OR OTHER CONTENT AVAILABLE ON/THROUGH THE SITE. PLEASE SEEK THE ADVICE OF PROFESSIONALS, AS APPROPRIATE, REGARDING THE EVALUATION OF ANY SPECIFIC OPINION, ADVICE OR OTHER CONTENT.

Limitation Of Liability

KSL specifically disclaims any liability (whether based in contract, tort, strict liability or otherwise) for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or special damages arising out of or in any way connected with access to or use of the Site, (even if KSL has been advised of the possibility of such damages) including liability associated with any viruses which may infect a user\'s computer equipment.

Privacy

Users are invited to submit comments, questions, ideas, reviews or any other information concerning The Hindu Business Line and the website\'s contents, provided they understand that such comments will be subject to moderation & The Hindu Business Line reserves the right to remove or edit such content. All such submissions should not be illegal, obscene, threatening, defamatory or infringing on privacy or on intellectual property rights of others.

Confidentiality Of User Communications

Except as required by law KSL will maintain the confidentiality of all user communications which contain personal user information & which are transmitted directly to KSL. Postings by a user on any message board or in any chat room will not be protected as confidential & KSL may use & provide information contained in any such postings (including any ideas, concepts, know-how or other intellectual property) to KSL for any purpose whatsoever & as deemed appropriate by KSL.

Linked Internet Sites

KSL prohibits caching, unauthorized hypertext links to the Site & the framing of any Content available through the Site. KSL reserves the right to disable any unauthorized links or frames & specifically disclaims any responsibility for the Content available on any other Internet sites linked to the Site. Access to any other Internet sites linked to the Site is at the user\'s own risk.

Postings

KSL is under no obligation to review any messages, information or content ("Postings") posted on the Site by users & assumes no responsibility or liability relating to any such Postings. Notwithstanding the above, KSL may from time to time monitor the Postings on the Site & may decline to accept and/or remove any Postings that contain

  • 1. Any unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, profane, hateful, racially, ethnically or otherwise objectionable material of any kind, including, but not limited to, any material which encourages conduct that would constitute a criminal offense, give rise to civil liability or otherwise violate any applicable local, state, national or international law.

  • 2. Advertisements or solicitations of any kind.

  • 3. Messages posted by users impersonating others.

  • 4. Personal information such as messages which state phone numbers, social security numbers, account numbers, addresses, or employer references.

  • 5. Messages by non-spokesperson employees of KSL purporting to speak on behalf of KSL..

  • 6. Messages that offer unauthorized downloads of any copyrighted or private information.

  • 7. Multiple messages placed within individual folders by the same user restating the same point.

  • 8. Chain letters /mails of any kind.


Changes To R & R

We reserve the right to revise these R & R at any time & Users are deemed to be apprised of & bound by any changes to these R & R. The latest updated R & R would be posted on the Site.

Violation Of Rules & Regulations

KSL reserves the right to seek all remedies available at law & in equity for violations of these T&C & R&R, including the right to block access from a particular Internet address to the Site.

Access To Password Protected/Secure Areas

Access to & use of password protected and/or secure areas of the Site is restricted to authorized users only. Unauthorized individuals attempting to access these areas of the Site may be subject to prosecution.

Arbitration

Any dispute arising out of or in connection with this agreement, including any question regarding its existence, amendment, validity or termination, shall be referred to & finally resolved by arbitration in accordance with the Indian Arbitration & Conciliation Act, 1996. The arbitration shall be a "documents only", evidence through affidavits "fast track" arbitration. The Tribunal shall consist of one (1) arbitrator to be appointed by Kasturi & Sons Limited. The exclusive seats of arbitration shall be Chennai, India & the language of the arbitration shall be English.

Governing Law
This agreement shall be governed by & construed in accordance with the laws of India. User access to & use of the Site is subject to all applicable laws.
Jurisdiction

In respect of all matters/disputes arising out of, in connection with or in relation to this agreement, only the civil courts at Chennai City, India shall have jurisdiction, to the exclusion of all other courts.


Publication
The Web site is deemed to be published from/at Chennai City, India (irrespective of where it is accessed from).

Communications

All communications and notices of any kind may be sent to:
Kasturi & Sons Ltd Kasturi Buildings 859-860, Anna Salai Chennai-600002 India

Thank you for downloading The Hindu Business Line Android app. Here\'s some help on how to use the app.

1. Follow your favorite subjects or topics.
Scroll to the bottom of the home screen and tap on "+Add sections" and add your favorite sections to the app\'s home screen.

2. Read whenever you want. Save articles for reading later.
When you are viewing an article, press the option key or tap the menu icon to bring up the context sensitive menu that will allow you to add the article to your favorites. Go to the \'Favorites\' section to find them and read later. You can long press the article tile in the \'Favorites\' section to remove it from the list once you are done.

3. Read more, easily.
Swipe an article from right to left to get the next one from the section. Also, swipe sections from left to right to go to the previous and next section in the navigation menu. You can swipe between subsections of a section by opening any one subsection from navigation menu and swipe across subsections of the same section.

4. Get Quote for any company by clicking on the \'Get Quote\' icon from topmost action bar.
5. Click on BSE, NSE, Gold or Forex to get to the respective screens for a list of corresponding item.

That\'s it! Have a great experience.

Business Line is a daily publication which caters to news from industry and markets, along with expert opinions and features on markets, industry, economy and technology.
This app is designed to provide you an immersive reading experience even as you keep yourself updated with business news on the go. You can now make informed business/investment decisions with the help of our expert opinions and holistic coverage of news from the market.

Disclaimer:
All information provided in the Business Line app is for informational purposes only, not intended for trading purposes or advice. Neither Kasturi & Sons Ltd, the sole proprietor of \'Business Line\' nor any of our data providers are liable for any informational or other errors, incompleteness, or delays, or for the consequence of any actions taken in reliance on information contained herein.
